channel.title: Programming on Jurjan Brust
channel.description: Recent content in Programming on Jurjan Brust

item.title: WSL 2 and docker compose
item.description: With the arrival of WSL 2 (Windows Subsystem for Linux), I thought it was a good time to learn more about this technology. I am surprised at the possibilities this offers. So let’s dive into this and use WSL 2 and Docker-Compose to fire up some containers to present sensor data in a Grafana dashboard.

item.title: Superheroes
item.description: Want to get started developing AngularJS / TypeScript applications using Visual Studio Code? In this blogpost I will show you how to get started in less time than a coffee break.
